thread.title: Michael Jackson’s Estate Faces Demand for Big Tax Payment
thread.title_full: Michael Jackson’s Estate Faces Demand for Big Tax Payment - WSJ

author: Hannah Karp
title: Michael Jackson’s Estate Faces Demand for Big Tax Payment
text:
When pop star Michael Jackson died in 2009, weeks before a planned comeback tour, how much was the man in the mirror worth? The answer is far from black and white.

After coming to agreements on the value of some of the King of Pop’s more concrete assets in a legal fight that began four years ago, the estate’s executors are facing off with the Internal Revenue Service in U.S. Tax Court on Monday, primarily over the valuation of the... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
